descriptions: Is your life like walking on eggshells?  Are you never sure when and why your child might get upset? Do they go from 0-100 in the blink of an eye?
Some children are highly sensitive to emotions and pressure, and parenting them takes a whole new skillset.

In this instalment of their popular webinar series, The Art of Low Demand Parenting, Dr Naomi Fisher (Changing Our Minds) and Eliza Fricker (Can't Not Won't, The Family Experience of PDA) bring their trademark informal and down to earth style to emotions - the low demand way.
They'll explain why many mainstream parenting approaches can make things worse and how to parent to help your child learn to manage their emotions.
You'll have access to this recording for 6 months after purchase.
testimonials: It’s such a breath of fresh air to feel understood!!
For the first time in over a year I feel hopeful.
I just wanted to express my happiness in this email. I attended your webinar on communication last night. I cried through most of it as I felt seen, not alone and like I have a direction to go in.
